outputs.output_descr:
1.	ICT skills developed for employment and alternative livelihoods
2.	Capacity Building and Institutional Strengthening in entrepreneurship and e-governance processes 
3.	Data management for reliable information access  enhanced
4.	National Capacity to conduct, analyze, report and disseminate key national studies/surveys/evaluations enhanced
5.	National M&E Capacity Improved
6.	Enhanced effective participation of central and local institutions and the civil societies for good decentralized governance
7.	Timely and reliable data availability at all levels
outputs.output_title: ICT as an enabler for dev't

project_descr: Enhanced access to Information Communication Technology (ICT) to deprived and under serve communities. Using ICT as an enabler to bridge facilitate decentralisation by providing access to information and data
